lyrics:
Mashed Potato Time Lyrics[Intro]
(It's the latest, it's the greatest, Mashed Potato)
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

[Verse 1]
A Mashed Potato started long time ago (Wah-woo)
With a guy named Sloppy Joe (Wah-woo)
You'll find this dance is so cool to do (Wah-woo)
Come on baby, gonna teach it to you

[Chorus]
(Mashed Potato) Get up to the beat now
(Mashed Potato) Mhmm, come on and twist your feet now, baby
(It's the latest) Come on honey
(It's the greatest) Come on baby
(Mashed Potato) Mhmm, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[Verse 2]
And then this dance just grew and grew (Wah-woo)
They look for records they can do it to (Wah-woo)
They found this dance was outta sight (Wah-woo)
Doin' The Lion Sleeps Tonight

[Chorus]
(Mashed Potato) Ya-a weem-o-wep a weem-o-wep
(Mashed Potato)  Mhmm, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
(It's the latest) Aw baby
(It's the greatest) Come on honey
(Mashed Potato) Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
(Wah-woo, wah-woo, wah-woo, wah-woo)

[Verse 3]
Now everybody is doin' fine (Wah-woo)
They dance alone for a bit more time (Wah-woo)
Then they discovered it's the most, man (Wah-woo)
The day they did it to Please Mr. Postman

[Chorus]
(Mashed Potato) Wait a minute, wait a minute
(Mashed Potato) Mhmm, deliver de letter
(It's the latest) Come on baby
(It's the greatest) Oh honey
(Mashed Potato) Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[Verse 4]
Well they got with it more and more (Wah-woo)
You ought to see 'em around the floor (Wah-woo)
The Mashed Potato took a long, long list (Wah-woo)
They even do it to Dear Lady Twist

[Chorus]
(Mashed Potato) Mhmm, get up on your tail now
(Mashed Potato) Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
(It's the latest) Come on baby
(It's the greatest) Oh honey
(Mashed Potato) Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

[Outro]
(Mashed Potato) Brrr, feel the groovy beat now1Embed
